subject: Order #SSN4258
description_text:
Hello,

I ordered the Simsonn Plus X Pedals on December 1st with order
number #SSN4258.
I paid for express shipping, which said it would be delivered in 3 to 7
days.
I received a confirmation email on December 1st and the payment was made on
the same day.
As of today, December 8th, I have not received any further information
regarding the shipment and the delivery deadline I paid for has already
passed.

I would like to know the status of my order and if there are any problems
with it.

Thank you in advance for your assistance.
Best regards,

João Azevedo

conversations.body_text: Hi João Azevedo,  Your order was originally scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to transportation delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They have now arrived at the warehouse, and we are processing them for storage and arranging DHL express shipping. We will update you with the tracking number tomorrow.
